meanings.definition: A person or thing that carries or transports something.
meanings.sent1: The strong carrier lifted the heavy boxes effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The delivery carrier dropped off the package at the doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The carrier ant worked tirelessly to move food to its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a carrier of joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The river acted as a carrier, carrying logs downstream.

meanings.definition: A company that provides transportation services.
meanings.sent1: The carrier offered affordable shipping rates for businesses.
meanings.sent2: The airline carrier had flights to various destinations.
meanings.sent3: The carrier's logo was a cute cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: Their reputation as a reliable carrier spread quickly.
meanings.sent5: The carrier's trucks were always on time for pickups.

meanings.definition: A substance that carries a disease or infection without displaying symptoms.
meanings.sent1: The mosquito acted as a carrier of the deadly virus.
meanings.sent2: The carrier of the flu unknowingly spread it to others.
meanings.sent3: The carrier pigeon delivered secret messages during the war.
meanings.sent4: The carrier of the illness was identified and isolated.
meanings.sent5: The carrier of the infection was traced back to the source.

meanings.sent1: The radio waves served as the carrier for the broadcast.
meanings.sent2: The carrier frequency was crucial for clear communication.
meanings.sent3: The carrier of the news was excited to share the update.
meanings.sent4: The carrier wave transmitted data across the network.
meanings.sent5: The carrier signal carried the instructions to the device.
